channel.title: Help with this

item.title: Help with this
item.dc:creator: @TranScape TranScape
item.description:
@TranScape wrote:

I got this code

} else if (NPCID == 553) { skillX = server.npcHandler.npcs[NPCSlot].absX; skillY = server.npcHandler.npcs[NPCSlot].absY; NpcWanneTalk = 3;

It work’s for aubury and his wannetalk looks like this

[code]case 3:
sendFrame200(4883, 591);
sendFrame126(GetNpcName(NpcTalkTo), 4884);
sendFrame126(“Do you want to buy some runes?”, 4885);
sendFrame75(NpcTalkTo, 4883);
sendFrame164(4882);
NpcDialogueSend = true;
break;

	case 4:
		sendFrame171(1, 2465);
		sendFrame171(0, 2468);
		sendFrame126("Select an Option", 2460);
		sendFrame126("Yes please!", 2461);
		sendFrame126("Oh it's a rune shop. No thank you, then.", 2462);
		sendFrame164(2459);
		NpcDialogueSend = true;
		break;

	case 5:
		sendFrame200(615, 974);
		sendFrame126(playerName, 975);
		sendFrame126("Oh it's a rune shop. No thank you, then.", 977);
		sendFrame185(974);
		sendFrame164(973);
		NpcDialogueSend = true;
		break;

	case 6:
		sendFrame200(4883, 591);
		sendFrame126(GetNpcName(NpcTalkTo), 4884);
		sendFrame126("Well, if you find somone who does want runes, please",4885);
		sendFrame126("send them my way.", 4886);
		sendFrame75(NpcTalkTo, 4883);
		sendFrame164(4882);
		NpcDialogueSend = true;
		break;

	case 7:
		sendFrame200(4883, 591);
		sendFrame126(GetNpcName(NpcTalkTo), 4884);
		sendFrame126("Well, if you find somone who does want runes, please",4885);
		sendFrame126("send them my way.", 4886);
		sendFrame75(NpcTalkTo, 4883);
		sendFrame164(4882);
		NpcDialogueSend = true;
		break;[/code]

So I made this code.

} else if (NPCID == 944) { skillX = server.npcHandler.npcs[NPCSlot].absX; skillY = server.npcHandler.npcs[NPCSlot].absY; NpcWanneTalk = 20;

and his wannetalk

[code]case 20:
sendFrame200(4883, 591);
sendFrame126(GetNpcName(NpcTalkTo), 4884);
sendFrame126(“Do you want to go training?”, 4885);
sendFrame75(NpcTalkTo, 4883);
sendFrame164(4882);
NpcDialogueSend = true;
break;

	case 21:
		sendFrame171(1, 2465);
		sendFrame171(0, 2468);
		sendFrame126("Select an Option", 2460);
		sendFrame126("Yes please!", 2461);
		sendFrame126("No, i'm not ready.", 2462);
		sendFrame164(2459);
		NpcDialogueSend = true;
		break;

	case 22:
		sendFrame200(615, 974);
		sendFrame126(playerName, 975);
		sendFrame126("No, i'm not ready yet.", 977);
		sendFrame185(974);
		sendFrame164(973);
		NpcDialogueSend = true;
		break;

	case 23:
		sendFrame200(4883, 591);
		sendFrame126(GetNpcName(NpcTalkTo), 4884);
		sendFrame126("Well, go get your things and lets go!",4885);
		sendFrame126("send them my way.", 4886);
		sendFrame75(NpcTalkTo, 4883);
		sendFrame164(4882);
		NpcDialogueSend = true;
		break;

	case 24:
		sendFrame200(4883, 591);
		sendFrame126(GetNpcName(NpcTalkTo), 4884);
		sendFrame126("Well, go get your things and lets go!",4885);
		sendFrame126("send them my way.", 4886);
		sendFrame75(NpcTalkTo, 4883);
		sendFrame164(4882);
		NpcDialogueSend = true;
		break;[/code]

It will ask them if they want to go but won’t go any further… Help?

Read full topic
